resources.string: VISION: \nPositively impact and solve problems in our community using tech

ABOUT: \n This is a student community built for those interested in Technology,Development and Design. We are also aimed help our members Network with each other and even other google developers. Registration take place every Monday from 5-6 PM in the ICT Hub.
